SELECT 100 * (sum(a.USD_CUR_AMT) - sum(a.USD_AMT)) / sum(a.USD_AMT) AS RETURN_RATE ,sum(a.USD_CUR_AMT) - sum(a.USD_AMT) AS USD_RETURN_AMT ,sum(a.WON_CUR_AMT) - sum(a.WON_AMT) AS WON_RETURN_AMT ,round(sum(a.USD_AMT),0) AS AMT_USD ,round(sum(a.WON_AMT),0) AS AMT_WON ,round(sum(a.USD_CUR_AMT),0) AS USD_CUR_AMT ,round(sum(a.WON_CUR_AMT),0) AS WON_CUR_AMT FROM ( SELECT decode(a.CURRENCY, 'USD', a.AVG_PRICE * 1093.44000 , a.AVG_PRICE) AS WON_AVG_PRICE ,decode(a.CURRENCY, 'USD', a.AMT * 1093.44000 , a.AMT) AS WON_AMT ,decode(a.CURRENCY, 'KRW', a.AVG_PRICE / 1093.44000 , a.AVG_PRICE) AS USD_AVG_PRICE ,decode(a.CURRENCY, 'KRW', a.AMT / 1093.44000 , a.AMT) AS USD_AMT ,decode(a.CURRENCY, 'USD', a.QTY * a.CPRICE * 1093.44000 , a.QTY * a.CPRICE) AS WON_CUR_AMT ,decode(a.CURRENCY, 'KRW', a.QTY * a.CPRICE / 1093.44000 , a.QTY * a.CPRICE) AS USD_CUR_AMT FROM ( SELECT a.SYMBOL ,a.AMT ,a.QTY ,(a.AMT/a.QTY) AS AVG_PRICE ,b.CURRENCY ,b.STOCK_EXCHANGE ,(SELECT p."CLOSE" FROM TYAH005 p WHERE p.TRADE_DATE = (SELECT max(TRADE_DATE) FROM TYAH005 WHERE SYMBOL = a.SYMBOL ) AND p.SYMBOL = a.SYMBOL ) AS CPRICE FROM ( SELECT a.PORTFOLIO_ID ,a.SYMBOL ,sum(a.QTY) AS qty ,sum(a.QTY * a.PRICE ) AS amt FROM TPOR002 a WHERE a.PORTFOLIO_ID = #{portfolio.portfolioId} GROUP BY a.SYMBOL ) a INNER JOIN TYAH001 b ON a.SYMBOL = b.SYMBOL ) a ) a
